website_summaries.verdict: Materials are resistant to the formulation of both mold and mildew.
pros: Available in clear or blue, which is very easy to see so you know it's in place
More than 200 suction cups to keep the mat affixed to the tub's surface securely
Vinyl material won't allow mold or mildew to form
cons: Not made to be used with a textured tub surface

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for breeding mold and mildew
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mat for just over two months, and it's now at the point that it can't be cleaned. The underside has grown mold in the areas around the suction cups-great if you want to start some blue cheese, not so much if you want to keep your bathroom clean. We've cleaned it on a weekly basis, but the mold gets such a foothold in the plastic that it now can't be cleaned. It's now part of the landfill where it can continue to fester unabated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mold doesn’t slip!
customer_reviews.text: I’m overly impressed so far! Firstly, it arrived much quicker than estimated. The length is perfect! I like the cut out for the drain and that it goes to the back of the tub. I have cleaned it without any problems. I spray it and leave it for ten minutes and scrub with a bath scrub brush and it’s clean! No issues whatsoever. So far, yes, I’m sold and I love it! No mold, and holds very well for my kids as I have a 1 year old and 4 year old. I will update if necessary but I definitely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Malorie

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick to the tub
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick to my tub. Their product information is not clear enough that you must have a smooth bottom tub. They have one tiny sentence at the bottom of the product information. Please be clear to show that this mat must have a smooth tub or it's useless. I am not complaining about the product, I am only annoyed that the description information was not Very clear that you must have a smooth bottom tub in order for the suction cups to adhere. I am unable to review the product itself because the bottom of my tub is not smooth therefore I could not use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bathing Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mat for my 70lb, elderly dog to use when I bath her. Great, she was very steady on her feet, no slipping. Highly recommend for this purpose even though she wasn’t thrilled :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Trash but  excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Well I've changed my 5 star to 1 star. After a week it looked terrible. It appeared black moldy. It looked like it had been in my shower for at least a year without ever being washed. I didn't even try to clean it because it would have been a daily job. Don't buy this item Youck, I threw it in the trash. The gorilla grip is perfect and my feet feel secure. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Materialmomny

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I found this! You can NOT find them in stores. It EXACTLY fits my bathtub so I ordered two! It is a must have if you have young children or the elderly living in your home!!!! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: KG2Q2Q

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sick stay away
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stick to the bath tub. I tried for about a good 30 minutes, It's completely useless. Save your time and money and stay away
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Mold loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is the mat in our kids’ bathroom. I got it specifically because it said it was resistant to mold and previous mats had gotten moldy. We drain all the water after each bath/shower and clean the tub consistently. We live in a dry climate yet this keeps growing mold so we threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We discovered months after buying our house that the tub my kids have been bathing in was simply painted by the previous owners. The paint is now peeling off of the tub floor. This is unsightly and the peeling paint is pokey. Since, replacing the tub is not an option at the moment, at least covering the bottom is a good temporary fix. This thing did the trick. It covers all of the bottom of the tub where the paint is peeling. You’d never know it was like that unless you take this mat out. Bath time is a whole lot more comfortable for the kids now!!
customer_reviews.author: km2008

customer_reviews.title: Great!!  Sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Matt for the tub, it is superlong so you don’t have to move it around which I did with our smaller ones. I highly recommend anyone to not hesitate and buy this. Actually bought two at the same time and I’m very glad I did because if I hadn’t I would’ve been ordering another one for our two bathrooms. The suctioning on this is great and it more than does it’s job. I feel very safe on this matt , which is one of the reasons I replaced our other ones . I’m very pleased thank you !
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Collects mildew and gunk fast, also never grips to the tub
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shower mat.... I bought it to replace my other mat... I wish I would of kept my old mat! This one never has stuck to the bath tub, comes up or slides when you stand on it, it also collects mildew or water stains very quickly. I just ordered a new bath mat and haven't even had this one 3 months. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: NOT mildew resistant
customer_reviews.text: I replace one of these every 6 months or so, since the mildew actually stains it. Even if you do take it up after you’re done showering, you’re still going to get mildew in the suction cups. I recommend using a scrub brush, as if you were brushing your teeth every few weeks or so.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: I'm on #3
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this three times. It works great, it's easy to clean, it's the best sticking mat I've found so far. Eventually, like all bath mats, it's gonna get gross to the point where it needs to be replaced, but the drainage holes in this make it last much longer than other things I've tried before. I'll continue to get this in the future as long as I have a need.
customer_reviews.author: corliss1

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my tub because my tub had sand paper texture and when my kids would take baths the toes of their feet would get scraped up. This is smooth enough that it is nice to feet but textured enough in a smooth way that I don't worry about anyone slipping and falling either. The suction cups work just fine with a bit of texture on the tub. I like how easy it is to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Boopoopbdoop

customer_reviews.title: Beats reglazing tub
customer_reviews.text: New tub mat comfortable and pretty in the tub. The glazing had started coming off on bottom of tub and mat covers it. The suction cups keep mat in place but need to be mashed down to start so it won't start floating when tub fills with water. I am satisfied. Mat exactly as described in Amazon ad.
customer_reviews.author: dog eared

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bath mat yet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if your putting 2 or 3 kids in the bath together. It's nice and long do the ones on the end aren't slipping around with half their butt of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Candace mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a waste of money...it has no suction power at all....stains don't come off easily even with my battery powered scrubber!!!! the length was OK but the color was not...it is an ugly blue and is transparent.....
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great non slip but gets moldy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat when my son started to take baths in the big bathtub. It’s great for nonslip so he doesn’t fall in the tub. We clean our tub every week. I noticed around the suctions black mold. It is very hard to scrub and get off. I’ve used all different products from natural to bleach to spray 9. I’ve tried to air dry over night and still black mold forms every week.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Witte

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, low price and does not bunch up or roll up in tub
customer_reviews.text: Stays clean in tub with easy rinse, does not bunch up in my tub and does not hold grime unlike others bought. Quick rinse and you're ok. Priced right and shipped fast so am happy with this. Feels great on the feet too and removes the slippery tub and the accidents that can happen. It is a large size so covers a good area for your walk.
customer_reviews.author: biggyboy1

customer_reviews.title: The shower mat fits a full bath sized tub
customer_reviews.text: I love the length of this bath mat. I like the clear color to show when it needs to be washed or replace. There is a little "u" where the drain area would go, nicely designed. The only small con was it is a little thinner than my smaller mat was., only 1 star off for that. I feel safe in the shower with this mat. Would recommend to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tell it like it is

customer_reviews.title: Great length for master bedroom tub
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for its length and nonslip surface. It fits great in the tub in the master bedroom. It's not as wide as the tub, but doesn't need to be. The kids haven't complained of it being uncomfortable. It's easy to clean, just make sure to air dry it after each use. I would recommend this for the extra coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Where Rivers Flow

customer_reviews.title: It wont stick properly
customer_reviews.text: The color is just beautiful!!!!! I love the way it looks, plus the size is perfect. But it wont stay :( omG it looks so perfect, but it just doesnt stick right to my tub, it moves all the time and I keep having to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Franco de Marín

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, sticks well, but a pain to clean
customer_reviews.text: Ended up throwing away when we moved because I hated cleaning it and could never get all the way around the base of the suction cups clean. That area between the suction cup and the mat was thin and hard to get in between, so mold and mildew constantly grew there.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat that fits the full length of my tub. It is comfortable to stand on as if there is some cushioning to it. As it is still very knew, I do not have a comment about ease of cleaning; however, I am hoping that the holes that allow the water to pass through, will alleviate any mold production.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: great for nonslip
customer_reviews.text: Great nonslip shower mat with suction cup bottom, mat is very long so will fit most if not all bathtubs. I did cut mine to be a bit shorter, easy to cut looks like it was purchased that way. Not very comfortable on the feet for adults showering, reason for the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a great feeling of security
customer_reviews.text: Works great and gives us a feeling of security . However it’s a pain to clean under all the suction cups. Once you put it back in the tub it seems you missed a couple or didn’t clean them well enough. Still would buy one for our oversized shower if we could find the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Aid for the Care Giver
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband whom after several debilitating back surgeries has a very difficult time just getting his leg lifted and foot planted securely in the tub before getting the other one in. This tub has made it much simpler. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Works and adds a nice color to the room.
customer_reviews.text: Well i haven't slipped yet...so it works. Not the most comfortable feeling under your feet but it stays in place well and is east to clean. I love that it has holes to let water flow so it doesnt get moldy. Good bang for your buck and adds color to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Van Ostenbridge

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mat and love that it is transparent so that the sun can kill any mold
customer_reviews.text: Really nice but because it was rolled so tightly the very end is still curled under even after having it in our tub for a week now and all 5 of us using it. I have let hot water run and sit on it and even step on it at the same time but it just won't stay... yet.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Bleacher Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't adhere to tub at all.  Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Followed all instructions that came with this mat. Still doesn't stick/slides down over drain. End is curled up and doesn't stick. I threw away the packaging so I'm sure that returning it isn't an option. The mat itself looks great, just wish it performed as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Luman

customer_reviews.title: Big yes,works no
customer_reviews.text: I would love to say it sucks ,but that is the problem it will not stay down I have tried rolling backwards, placing books on it,hot water and pushing each sucking point down and still will not stay flat after one week. Mad.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Use this with my girls during their bathtime so they don't slip. Sticks great and haven't had any mildew problems at all. I love that it's longer than what's available in stores so it covers the entire tub.
customer_reviews.author: nc_girl77

customer_reviews.title: Fits entire length of tub
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect for children. It has a good grip and is comfortable for standing on. It fits the entire length of the tub making it less slippery when getting in and out of the tub as well as showering. It is easy to clean, but takes some elbow grease to get out normal build up. I got the clear mat which I think shows more when it is dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Mama from Maui

customer_reviews.title: safe secure soft mat great length.
customer_reviews.text: safe secure soft mat great length ..one of the best i have ever seen price is good too...for your frail, sick or feeble friends..it is a wonderfully safe mat
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s more slippery than the tub is,’many of the suction cups don’t stay down, and it traps moisture underneath making mold appear after just a few days. It’s now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail R Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Adequate mat for tubs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly to use in my stand up shower. They work great on my bathtubs, but will not adhere to my shower floor. If your shower is custom built without a smooth floor, they will not stick. I found this out the hard way by almost doing a header into the shower door.
customer_reviews.author: Reg Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The only thing I don't like is that even though there are holes in the mat, you cannot cover the drain at all, the water does not properly drain through the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Product worked pretty well. It doesn’t always suction right away. It is also difficult to clean. My husband ended up taking a tooth brush and cleaned each suction cup and pad by hand. A very tedious task. After a year we thee it out and purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: Suction power isn’t good at all , it moves around after everyone showers , it’s a pain to fix it every time , I’ve had it for a month now and no mold yet so that’s good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bathtub Mat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my mom and it has worked great! She was falling in the bath tub and this mat has saved her literally saved her life!
customer_reviews.author: Kandi Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stick.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this - but outside of the color, it doesn't do it's job! It is constantly rolling up on the ends and is impossible to get to stick in place. The kids have started to use it as a bath toy instead of it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JsReviews

customer_reviews.title: More than shady.....
customer_reviews.text: So the pic of this makes it look like it's very transparent and just a shade of lighter gray. When you put it in the tub, it almost looks solid, very heavy, dark, and almost brownish? Not sure what kind of lighting they used to photograph it, but in general lighting it's very dark so be warned. It did cover the entire tub basin however, which was what I was looking for, but I sent it back because the color was so different in person than the photo, I'd advise the clear version!
customer_reviews.author: James in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying bath mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathmat. It's very easy to clean. It stays gripped to the tub. It does not slide like other mats which is a plus. Great value and product. I will be ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: Dr. suggested a bath mat for safety if for no other reason. This replaced a much smaller one. Use it almost every day. Washed it and it came out fine. One of the best purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Katz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Although the description indicates that the mat is machine washable, I would have to put the mat into washer everyday. The area around the suction cups is always gunky and needs to be scrubbed daily. Not an easy task. The mat is lifted after every shower and hung to dry. I do feel that the footing is supplies keeps you safe I am looking for another mat that might be easier to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good bathtub mat
customer_reviews.text: It's long, it fit the entire bathtub, it doesn't scrunch up like the previous one that I had before I bought this one. Sticks well to the tub. Easy to keep clean. No problem at all, I finally found a good bathtub mat.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.Green

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great bath mat it’s a great size it does feel weird to stand on could be less money for the functionality of it and cleaning can be a little difficult
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler no longer slips in the bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups work well. Nice and grippy when wet. My toddler, despite our best efforts, still stands up in the bathtub sometimes. Now he no longer slips and falls when he does that.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rau

customer_reviews.title: Best Mar Ever!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST bath mat I’ve ever purchased. I’m not just saying that, because all the money I’ve spent on cheaply made baths mat is outrageous. I spent $2 more on this mat compared to the others and it’s lasted, easy to clean no mildew.. I will ONLY buy this from now on.. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a long leisurely bath
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable. Keeps from slipping when getting out of the tub. You can put a washcloth under foot for extra sure-foot. Also, pull up mat every so often to clean bottom of mat and tub, or dirt will collect over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for SMOOTH tubs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat and it definitely doesn't slip. The reason I lowered the stars is that it doesn't suction to our bathtub. We had to scoot it way back to where the smooth starts. Once it is stuck back there it doesn't move much.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Stays flat and doesn't slide
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom, and she's very pleased with it. She said it stays flat and doesn't slide, and she feels safe using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great potential
customer_reviews.text: The end was recieved folded/bent so it doesn't hold a suction in the last 2 rows. I can see the potential. The size really helps my toddler from falling. Just wish she wasn't about to pull it up because the end doesn't hold the suction.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya S.

customer_reviews.title: Ends curled
customer_reviews.text: loved the mats, except the end curled up and I was never able to get it to lay flat at that one end. Used it for several years and never did uncurl. Other than that it was a good mat
customer_reviews.author: Irene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Real long.Great tub
customer_reviews.text: Great tub/shower bath mat. The full length is wonderful for getting in and out of the tub. Will buy another one,
customer_reviews.author: Papillon

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the bath/shower! Cleaning is very easy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and sticks really well to tub. No more slippery accidents in the shower for now. I do like that it hasn't molded and has plenty of holes for good drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits in the bottom of my tub perfectly. No more falls getting into the tub! Absolutely perfect it fits snugly on the bottom of the tub and as very comfortable to the feet
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was long enough and wide enough. My husband got surgery so he needed a mat to grib him better in the tub. This one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: fannwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my tub, which was a bit slippery for bathing a baby. This mat is perfect! She no longer slides around in the tub and seems to love her bath time even more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: This product slips in the bathtub. The large suction cups do not stay attached so the entire mat will move. Dangerous for anyone who has struggles with stability.
customer_reviews.author: JDL

customer_reviews.title: Decent mat...full coverage...
customer_reviews.text: Decent bathmat for kids shower/bath. Full coverage is nice. No mildew problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Joclyn Reilly

customer_reviews.title: slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.text: This was a lovely addition to the bath, until i stepped on it and almost flew to the ground. Does not give a good grip compared to by bare tub. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchase another one, great price and good quality, fits my tub perfect, nice size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for slippage
customer_reviews.text: The only thing disliked is that it comes rolled and it's hard to get the kink out so it will lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Protects Toddler from Slipping.
customer_reviews.text: Very long (in a good way) easy to clean, and its great for my daughter who doesnt like to sit during baths (at all)
customer_reviews.author: Z. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Good Bath Mat
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Comfortable to stand on when showering. Sturdy and isn’t slippery. Stays in place. Length is perfect for tub.
customer_reviews.author: LizAnne

customer_reviews.title: I love that it fits my entire bath tub
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits my entire bath tub. It's safer for my entire family, including toddlers. follow the instructions to keep it clean and it will last you longer!
customer_reviews.author: Es

customer_reviews.title: she’s still pretty small so when she sits in the tub she ...
customer_reviews.text: This is lifesaver for when I bathe my baby, she’s still pretty small so when she sits in the tub she slides everywhere and I’m worried she’ll and hit her head or fall facedown into the water. Doesn’t happpen with this 🙌🏽
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a little longer. But it fits great and is comfortable on the feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks and does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold grip/ doesn’t work I’m planning to trash 🗑 it
customer_reviews.author: Rocket scientist emeritus

customer_reviews.title: Great non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Great as a non-slip Color fades after 3-4 months of use Anti-fungal works for the first month but after requires maintenance
customer_reviews.author: Benny B.

customer_reviews.title: Makes the shower feel much safer.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I haven't slipped in the tub once. After spinal surgery o was very shaky on my feet and this helped immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. Kids don’t fall anymore. Cute color. I suggest hanging it up after every use so as to not create mold in the suction grips. But we like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: It slips a tiny bit, but still works
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. I was using two shorter ones before, but this is better.
customer_reviews.author: Atwater Annie

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: Love it because my 1 and a half takes showers in the bathtub and this way she doesn’t fall. The one thing I wish it will stick are the ends of the mat. But it is exactly what I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's really that great
customer_reviews.text: This tub mat is awesome. Lots of suction cups that stick, more than long enough to fit my tub and nice to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: JerzeeGurl

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place. Love the length and width. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This may is longer than I thought it would be. The auctions aren't that great but will stay put when u step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie P.

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would write a review on a bath mat. Honestly, I just threw it out because I couldn't be bothered to return it but this was worthless. Did not stay down in the tub, if the bath was filled it started to float, bunched up under my grandchild. Glad to see it out of stock so no one else buys it.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length.
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect replacement for our old dingy looking mat. I got the clear color and it really makes the bathroom look brighter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eberhard

customer_reviews.title: Great for garden tub.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an X-large bath mat. Fits garden tub perfectly, so kids don’t slip anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Tineka Watkins

customer_reviews.title: over a year and it's still works
customer_reviews.text: we love it has helped me worry less when my son is in the tub
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Blue color comes off the blue ones and gets all over everything
customer_reviews.text: Bought the blue ones Just holding them made my hands blue Horrible Wish I could return but I took them to our home out of state and didn’t want to bring them all the way back to California My loss
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my toddler to be able to sit and play during bath time without slipping and sliding. Got exactly what I was looking for. The color is great, the size and suction is great. Had it for about 2 years and just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: nandah15

customer_reviews.title: Safe from fallung
customer_reviews.text: I love it great to stand or lay on . thw best thing is i am safe from falling.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Fits the whole tub
customer_reviews.text: Great product it sticks firmly and cleans easily and cover my whole tub area I DIG THIS MAT and will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mena Smoak

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: Great size, doesn't move much, and is easy to clean when you need to!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for transitioning my daughter form her baby bath to sitting up in the tub! She doesn’t slip and slide!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love how it fits perfect for my shower. I love the little cutout for drain
customer_reviews.author: Gail R.

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe when I shower
customer_reviews.text: I got it because I have fall couple times because my knees and back. I put on the tube and I feel safe. When it time to clean the tube I take it out and hang it. I like it and I feel safe I will not fall in the tube
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo C.

customer_reviews.title: Shower must have!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my main bathroom, it’s great for non Slip and cushions the feet for luxurious showers. I like that it’s removable for cleaning vs stick ons. I picked this particular model as it was bpa free, appeared sleek, and blended with the rest of my bathroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: No slipping in this bathtub!
customer_reviews.text: My guest bathroom needed a shower mat -- this one fits the bill perfectly. Clear, lots of suction cups, and a nice texture to prevent anyone slipping. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal guy

customer_reviews.title: Great bath tub mat
customer_reviews.text: Great bath tub mat. It fits the whole length of my tub. It has a cut out to the end of the drain for easy hair clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Donley

customer_reviews.title: Long but slippery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that it will prevent us from slipping. While it is long enough and covers the floor of the tub, it is of poor quality and slippery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No slipping
customer_reviews.text: No slipping and falling in shower equals no law suits
customer_reviews.author: D & J Angel

customer_reviews.title: No mildew collection
customer_reviews.text: This looks good. I like that it fits the entire length of the tub. The suction on them is strong and it doesnt collect mildew like other bathmats
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Improved
customer_reviews.text: This has made bath time for the baby so much easier
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Sevin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life saver for our family. The size is perfect and all it takes to clean is spraying some cleaner on it and letting it sit. Its great!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stick to my tub. Don’t know why but it’s defintely a waste
customer_reviews.author: linden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our square tub
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our square tub, non-slip for our little one, and easy to hang up and put down.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

product_meta.title: Wimaha XL Bathtub Mat, Bath Shower Mat Non Slip for Bathroom, Machine Washable, Ideal for Kids Toddler Senior, 39 x 16, Clear
feature_bullets: Extra Long & Non Slip & Eco-friendly. ★★★ Recognize Wimaha. Please Noted: Don't Be Fooled By Frauds With Lower Price Especially. Purchase from Wimaha Only to Get Reliable & Premium Product.★★★

SAFE & ECO-FRIENDLY: Our bath shower mats are made from high-quality plastic. They feature 200 Gorilla Grip suction cups that help hold in place on smooth, clean surfaces. This bath mat is a great choice for the home, gym, spa and more!

EXTRA LONG & TINY HOLES: Our extra large and generously sized mat is 100 x 40cm and provides excellent coverage. Many other mats are smaller leaving areas of your tub exposed. And while other mats are solid creating puddle of water underside, our mat features 176 small holes throughout to allow water to circulate.
MACHINE WASHABLE: Our durable mat is machine-washable to facilitate hassle-free maintenance. To clean at any time, simply toss the mat into the machine and enjoy its fresh appearance.

BEAUTIFUL & COMFORTABLE: Our extra long bath mats provide a durable modern addition to any bathroom. Pebble design leads the way in supportive and comfortable bath products. We created this bathroom mat with most people in mind, including children and elderly. This versatile bath mat covers an extensive range of uses, ideal for hotels, hospitality to contemporary bathrooms.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If you have received any defective products, please don 't hesitate to contact us. We will immediately send you replacement or arrange a full refund.
